title: Replace Dashboard with Knowledge Board for Hospital Licenses

requirements.text: Create a KnowledgeBoard page component at frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBoard.tsx that displays comprehensive information about hospital licenses and regulatory requirements

quotes: remove dashboard and create knowledge Board instead of this. information about Licences - reference link https://www.researchgate.net/publication/398379014_LICENCE_REQUIRED_FOR_HOSPITALS

acceptanceCriteria: KnowledgeBoard.tsx component exists at frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBoard.tsx
Component displays hero section explaining hospital licensing information
Content is sourced from or references https://www.researchgate.net/publication/398379014_LICENCE_REQUIRED_FOR_HOSPITALS
Page follows the existing McKinsey-inspired professional design theme

requirements.text: Display hospital license types and categories on the Knowledge Board page including license classifications, regulatory bodies, and compliance requirements based on the reference document from https://www.researchgate.net/publication/398379014_LICENCE_REQUIRED_FOR_HOSPITALS
acceptanceCriteria: Knowledge Board displays organized sections covering license types
Content references the ResearchGate publication on hospital licenses
Information is structured with clear headings and bullet points
Sections are visually organized with cards or expandable panels

requirements.text: Display regulatory compliance requirements on the Knowledge Board page covering hospital registration, accreditation standards (NABH, ISO), and legal obligations for healthcare facilities
acceptanceCriteria: Regulatory compliance section is visible on Knowledge Board
Content covers registration processes and accreditation standards
Legal obligations and requirements are clearly outlined
Information is presented in a scannable, easy-to-read format

requirements.text: Update the route configuration in frontend/src/App.tsx to replace the existing '/dashboard' route with a '/knowledge-board' route that renders the KnowledgeBoard page component

quotes: remove dashboard and create knowledge Board instead of this

acceptanceCriteria: Route '/knowledge-board' exists in frontend/src/App.tsx
Route renders KnowledgeBoard page component within Layout wrapper
Previous '/dashboard' route is removed or replaced
Route is accessible to authenticated users

requirements.text: Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to replace the 'Dashboard' link with a 'Knowledge Board' link that routes to '/knowledge-board'

quotes: remove dashboard and create knowledge Board instead of this

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation displays 'Knowledge Board' link instead of 'Dashboard'
Link routes to '/knowledge-board' path
Link is conditionally displayed based on authentication state
Active route highlighting works for Knowledge Board link

requirements.text: Apply the existing enterprise design theme (White background, Deep Blue text, professional typography) to the Knowledge Board page ensuring visual consistency with other pages
acceptanceCriteria: Knowledge Board uses consistent color scheme with rest of site
Typography matches enterprise design standards
Spacing and layout follow existing design patterns
Page is fully responsive on mobile and desktop viewports

requirements.text: Add multiple CTAs on the Knowledge Board page including top CTA in hero section, mid-page CTA in content area, and bottom CTA before footer, all encouraging demo bookings
acceptanceCriteria: At least three CTAs are present on Knowledge Board page
CTAs are strategically placed (top, middle, bottom)
All CTAs encourage demo booking or consultation
CTAs follow existing button styling and interaction patterns

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo unless absolutely necessary for new data structures
Preserve existing authentication and authorization logic
Maintain read-only status of frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts and frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Keep the existing single-actor backend architecture
nonGoals: Implementing a full CMS for managing Knowledge Board content
Creating admin interface for editing license information
Building PDF document upload functionality for license documents
Implementing user-generated content or comments on Knowledge Board
Creating separate pages for each license type

required: Professional illustration showing hospital license documents and regulatory compliance (hospital-licenses-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
Icon or illustration representing healthcare regulatory compliance and accreditation (compliance-standards.dim_800x600.png)
Visual representation of hospital registration and licensing process flowchart (licensing-process.dim_1200x800.png)
